title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors:

a. Multiple selection could be enabled

c. The default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as (default) (similar to perspectives)

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint

g. The File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same

I currently have fixes for a, c, and f.

Need to release

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, and g
OB: No selection is made, but OK is enabled.
EB: The selected external editor is added to the Internal Editors list even if no selection is made.
SR:
MA (09/08/2001 12:04:06)

To reproduce the issue:

1. Go to the Workbench File Editors preference page
2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' list, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (with no selection made) and press OK

Expected result:

The selected external editor should not be added to the Internal Editors list if no selection is made.
